description: Create column Language at index 6 based on column LibraryCloud using expression grel:value.parseXml().select('mods|languageTerm[type="code"]')[0].xmlText()
Create column Country at index 6 based on column LibraryCloud using expression grel:value.parseXml().select('mods|placeTerm[type="code"]')[0].xmlText()
Create column Holding Libraries at index 6 based on column LibraryCloud using expression grel:forEach(value.parseXml().select("librarycloud|HarvardRepository"),v,v.xmlText()).join(" | ")
Create column First Subject at index 6 based on column LibraryCloud using expression grel:value.parseXml().select('mods|subject[authority="lcsh"]')[0].xmlText()

Create column Statement of responsibility at index 6 based on column LibraryCloud using expression grel:forEach(value.parseXml().select('mods|note[type="statement of responsibility"]'),v,v.xmlText()).join(" // ")
Create column Publication date at index 6 based on column LibraryCloud using expression grel:value.parseXml().select('mods|dateIssued')[0].xmlText()

expression: grel:forNonBlank(cells["Title"].value,v,v,"[no title] /") + ' ' + forNonBlank(cells["Statement of responsibility"].value,v,v,"[no statement of responsibility]") + ' | ' + cells['MMS ID'].value"
description: Text transform on cells in column Title using expression grel:forNonBlank(cells["Title"].value,v,v,"[no title] /") + ' ' + forNonBlank(cells["Statement of responsibility"].value,v,v,"[no statement of responsibility]") + ' | ' + cells['MMS ID'].value"
